projects.appBio: Al-Bedaa - A comprehensive platform for building materials and equipment.
projects.fullDescription: Al-Bidhaa" is the perfect app for advertising construction materials and equipment. Whether you're a seller looking to showcase your products or a buyer searching for the best deals, "Al-Bidhaa" provides an easy-to-use platform to buy and sell everything you need to build and equip your projects. Discover a wide range of materials and equipment from local and international suppliers, and start building a better future with "Al-Bidhaa.

futureList.future: Material Type Filter: Allow users to filter materials based on type, brand, and quality.
Price Comparison: Enable users to compare prices for similar products across different vendors.
Project-Based Search: Search for materials based on the specific type of construction project.
Augmented Reality (AR) for Material Visualization: Let users visualize how materials (tiles, furniture, etc.) would look in a real-world space before purchasing.
Seller Analytics: Provide sellers with detailed insights and reports on sales, inventory, and customer preferences.
Buyer Wishlist: Allow buyers to create wishlists for future projects or purchases.
Contractor Marketplace: A feature where contractors can connect with other professionals for collaborations or sub-contracting.
Project Collaboration Tools: Provide a space for project owners, engineers, and contractors to collaborate on purchasing decisions and project requirements.
Inventory Forecasting: Using AI to predict demand trends for various construction materials based on seasonality and market trends.

projects.appBio: Investment Opportunities Shows Us What’s Possible. Fund It Here.
projects.fullDescription: The focus on financial technology is increasing globally and locally as an ideal option for economic diversification, and given the enormous and distinctive potential of startups in the Kingdom, one of the goals of the Kingdom's Vision 2030 has become to support local startups and medium-sized companies.

futureList.future: AI-Based Investment Recommendations: Personalized investment suggestions based on user behavior and market trends.
Real-Time Market Analysis: Insights into financial trends, including risk assessment and ROI predictions.
Portfolio Diversification Tool: Helps investors balance their portfolio across different asset types.
Investor Community Forum: A space for investors to discuss market trends and opportunities.
Expense & Investment Tracking: A dashboard for monitoring income, investments, and financial goals.
Auto-Invest Feature: Users can set predefined rules for automated periodic investments.
Regulatory Compliance Dashboard: A feature to keep investors updated on financial regulations.
Partnerships with Financial Institutions: Expanding investment opportunities beyond the current market.

projects.appBio: Smart Design application provides advanced technical consultations and solutions.
projects.fullDescription: Smart Design App is an advanced platform crafted to streamline the management of engineering projects for clients of the consultancy. Designed to facilitate efficient communication between clients, contractors, and the consultancy, it offers a comprehensive set of tools for tracking project phases, materials, and timelines. The app also provides easy access to support and project information, and is available in both English and Arabic

futureList.future: Offers a detailed overview of the consultancy's services, with descriptions to help users understand the scope and benefits of each service.

Displays a curated list of recent projects with descriptions and images. Confidential project details are secured and only accessible to clients with the unique project code
.
Provides a visual summary of the consultancy’s project portfolio, showing total projects and their distribution by year, offering insights into trends and experience by Projects Progress Chart.
Details all the services offered by the consultancy, with comprehensive descriptions outlining the scope, benefits, and processes of each service. This screen is accessible to all users.

Showcases completed projects with general details and images. While the overview is public, specific confidential details are restricted to clients with the unique project code, ensuring sensitive information remains protected.
Features albums organized by project categories, including high-quality images and videos of completed projects. This gallery serves as a visual portfolio showcasing the consultancy’s achievements.
Describes the step-by-step process of project implementation. It includes an explanatory video providing a comprehensive overview of each phase, helping clients understand the project lifecycle.

Accessible only to clients via their unique project code, these screens allow detailed tracking of every phase and step in the project’s implementation. Clients can monitor progress, view phase descriptions, and receive updates or notifications about any delays, ensuring complete transparency and control over their projects.

projects.appBio: Masharef Hills application provides advanced digital solutions for the residential community.
projects.fullDescription:
Masharef Hills application provides advanced digital solutions for the residential community, enhances communication between residents, and improves the overall quality of life. It provides a range of services, including:
- Entry and exit tracking system: The application can be used to track people entering and exiting the residential complex
- Requesting services: Residents can request services from the complex management, such as maintenance of the complex facilities, through the application.
- Booking facilities: Residents can book the complex facilities,

projects.appBio: Simply buy and sell…
projects.fullDescription: Tshtri is an online marketplace where you can sell and buy nearly anything quickly, easily, and safely. Within minutes, click, upload, and sell! Our platform helps you sell and buy the right product at the right place.

futureList.future: Enjoy a better and faster user interface.
You can offer your product for sale easily, smoothly, and quickly, much more than before, and in fewer steps.
You can set a fixed price for your commodity or make it on a bidding process, and then you can set a default bid, or leave the matter open to bidders.
You will receive a notification whenever someone adds a higher bid than previously recorded.

Once a bid is accepted, the bidding process will be closed on the commodity, and a chat will be opened between you and the buyer for a direct agreement on the sale. If you both agree, you will choose (Item Sold Out) to show everyone that the commodity is (Sold).
The buyer will also receive a notification with a message when his bid is accepted and he can reply to you directly.
You can now also respond to buyers' comments on your item.

projects.appBio: eToy App: Swap, Giveaway, Sell…
projects.fullDescription: eToy App is a community that makes a difference, not just an app. eToy App is a unique platform that brings together like-minded people in their communities to swap, give away, or even sell preloved (used) toys in a pleasant setting. Say YES to spreading joy to other children. A simple act that teaches your child the worth of his possessions and how to take care of them (while also decluttering your home!). eToy App also contributes to the reduction of current plastic usage and waste on our earth

futureList.future: swap, give away, or even sell preloved (used) toys in a pleasant setting.
Spread the culture of recycling and gifting. Create your profile, set your location, and join your local etoy community for kid’s toys.
eToy App also contributes to the reduction of current plastic usage and waste on our earth
help you to decluttering your home!
Browse and search for preloved toys, and engage your kid in finding their favorites too! etoy is a child-friendly environment app.
By using etoy app, you are helping in cutting down on the current plastic used resulting in waste across our planet & making another kid happy.
Contact the toy provider through etoy and confirm the drop-off point to close the deal. etoy is a peer-to-peer marketplace.
We also love to give back! Close the deal, and engage with etoyers to gain points & gifts. Be a recycling etoyer hero your child will proud of!.

projects.appBio: Elevate your dining journey…
projects.fullDescription: Afandem: Your ultimate dining companion for a seamless restaurant experience,revolutionizes dining out experience.

futureList.future: Scan and Access: you can easily scan the QR code on your table to access the restaurant's menu. No need to wait for a server to bring you a physical menu.

Customize Your Order: you can choose your order and customize it to your liking. You can specify any special requests or dietary requirements and ensure your meal is prepared just the way you like it.
Reviews: you can leave reviews for each item in the menu, as well as for the overall restaurant experience.
helps other diners make informed choices and provides valuable feedback to the restaurant.
Split the Bill: You can split the bill with your friends on the same table. No need to fumble with cash or calculate who owes what.
Easy Payment: You can pay for your meal using your Visa card or with cash, all from within the app.

projects.appBio: Efficient Control for Success…
projects.fullDescription:
Effortlessly manage your restaurant with Afandem Admin. Streamline operations and deliver exceptional service. Afandem Admin is the ultimate tool for restaurant owners and managers.
Take control of your restaurant operations with ease:

futureList.future: Streamline Menu: Create and update menus, add dishes, set prices, and manage categories effortlessly.
Efficient Order Processing: Receive and process customer orders in real-time.
Manage Tables: Seamlessly handle table reservations, assign tables to customers, and track seating availability.
Staff Organization: Assign roles, manage shifts, and track staff performance for smooth operations.
Insightful Analytics: Access comprehensive reports on sales, revenue, and customer feedback to make data-driven decisions.
User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy a seamless and intuitive interface that makes restaurant management a breeze.
